message: Salt too much! The broth is as salty as the sea.
A dash too much salt, be careful with the green papaya next time.
Are you sure your tongue will not dry out with all the salt?
Salt is just right! The broth tastes clean and comforting.
Cooking time nailed! The chicken is tender and the vegetables are perfect.
Excellent balance! This tinola feels warm and soothing.
